blog.name: aw-hawkeye-no
blog.title: Between Iron and Silver
blog.description: Michelle. 28. Find me on Ao3 at aw_writing_no. Multifandom, mostly Marvel. Becoming a Good Omens blog one Ineffable Husbands post at a time. Multishipper, not interested in character/ship hate. Everything tagged.

summary: All My Friends (Take Good Care of Me) - Chapter 4 - aw_writing_no - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: All My Friends (Take Good Care of Me) - Chapter 4 - aw_writing_no - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
@spidergwenstefani, I’m definitely a horrible influence trying to distract you from your essays. I mean, give you a much needed study break. 

So maybe Tony is a romantic at heart. But if you tell anyone, you’ll definitely get a repulsor beam to the face.

99% Ironstrange | drpepperony is 💞 | sometimes i write | sometimes i just imagine things | my inbox is always open | Arbonne@AO3 | cute chibi!stephen commissioned from @descaladumidera | beautiful header by @ironstrange-is-the-endgame
💫

tags: i wish you would write a fic where...
summary: I wish you would write a fic where...Pepper recognized Stephen that moment at the park.
question: I wish you would write a fic where...Pepper recognized Stephen that moment at the park.
answer:
🥰

Oh, that’s such a nice idea! And you know that this is going to be OT3, right? With a happy end? Throw the words “Pepper and Stephen” at me and I immediately see them embracing each other and kissing while Tony looks at the two most gorgeous people he has ever seen and is filled with so much happiness mixed with a “what have I done to deserve this?” And then they turn around and drag Tony into their embrace. (Pepper and Stephen work on their own, too. Just like Pepper and Tony and Tony and Stephen. But the three of them together is just another level of love where everyone gets even more out of the relationship.)

Okay, Pepper knows Stephen. I can do that. Here is the outline:

  • Pepper and Stephen are about the same age and know each other from their early twenties when they were in uni together. They had an affair - they both liked and even loved each other but knew that it wasn’t forever.
  • Their ways parted on good terms when Stephen went into medicine and Pepper into economics.
  • Stephen, of course, heard that she had become the CEO of one of the biggest companies of the world and had found none other than Tony Stark for herself and was proud of her. And maybe indulged a little bit in “what if”.
  • Pepper, in turn, heard about his accident even though they had lost any contact she was sad enough that day that Tony asked her what had happened and she told him about her old flame. Tony offered to reach out to offer SIs help but Stephen had already vanished to Kamar-Taj by that time.
  • To say that Pepper is surprised when Stephen appears in front of them is the understatement of the century. She just has time to whisper “it’s him. It’s my Stephen” to Tony before Tony is whisked away through the portal. And Tony, dimly remembering Pepper’s stories of an arrogant asshole with a well-hidden heart of gold, tries to protect Stephen. First on Earth, then on the Donut ship. It doesn’t take long for him to see through the arrogant facade and see the real man beneath it and he understands what Pepper has seen in him all those years ago. Tony rather likes the whole package, inside and out.
  • Stephen realizes that Pepper must have told Tony about him and doesn’t know how to feel about it. When he looks into the different futures he sees timelines where he gets together with Pepper again after Tony’s death at Thanos’ hands; he sees timelines where he and Tony end up after Pepper’s. He sees himself die and Pepper and Tony lead happy lives. A thousand variations of the same theme, over and over again.
  • He falls in love again with Pepper and realizes that he is very much capable of falling in love with Tony if he’s given a little bit of time to do so.
  • There is one, just one, timeline where the three of them end up together. But it’s also the most unlikely one, shrouded in uncertainty and the path into that future is so insanely twisted and long that Stephen rejects it out of hand without looking at the details and chooses one where Thanos is defeated with minimal deaths and Pepper and Tony get their happy end.
  • But Pepper is stubborn and even the few minutes in the park have been enough to let her see that Stephen’s not in a good shape. Mentally or physically. So first she goes to rescue Tony only to find him in the middle of rescuing himself. They then work together to bring all the lost ones back - including a reluctant Stephen who tries to hide himself away after the dust (ha!) has settled.
  • Pepper is not satisfied with that. She gets the location of the Sanctum from Tony and goes over there to speak to Stephen. She almost wants to cry when she really sees the shaking ruin of Stephen’s beautiful hands and doesn’t leave until he has accepted a dinner invitation. She hugs him and doesn’t want to let him go again.
  • Pepper’s old feelings for Stephen reawaken. Tony beings to develop feelings for him. They begin to talk if it might be possible to add Stephen into their relationship. Pepper has always known that Stephen is bi and that Tony is exactly his type. Stephen is already so in love with both of them it hurts but much too afraid to even think about the possibilities. He doesn’t want to “steal” one of them form the other and the thought of a triad doesn’t really occur to him.
  • Pepper - with Tony’s active encouragement - pursues Stephen and tries to rekindle the affair.
  • Tony and Stephen spend more and more time together and Tony tries to seduce Stephen.
  • Poor Stephen is confused as hell. And also turned on like never before in his life.
  • Wong calls him an idiot who doesn’t see what’s right in front of him.
  • He finally understands after yet another dinner of three when Tony decides “fuck it!” and stands up, puts his hands on Stephen’s face and just kisses him as if his life depends on it while Pepper watches them with the biggest smile on her face before she pushes Tony away to kiss Stephen herself.
  • Stephen feels like the biggest idiot and must lucky person in the history of the multiverse at the same time.
  • The next morning Stephen wakes with his head on Pepper’s chest and his back pressed against Tony’s. Peppers fingers are wrapped around his right wrist and Tony has a possessive hand on his hip. He’s too warm and feels trapped but you couldn’t pay him enough to even move an inch.
  • Even the Cloak looks at him with an “took you long enough” gesture.
  • Tony and Pepper have talked things to death long beforehand and know where they stand and what they want but Stephen is still stunned when he realizes that this isn’t an affair but a relationship for the rest of his life.

Bonus:

  • Tony turns into the caretaker of their family while Pepper is busy being a CEO and Stephen’s responsibilites as Sorcerer Supreme grow and grow.

  • Pepper and Tony both always pay special attention to Stephen’s hands without being annoying or overbearing about it.

  • Stephen learns how to handle Tony’s chronic pain and to recognize the signs of a bad day.

  • Stephen and Tony are great in giving Pepper the space she needs when one of her migraines hit and she just wants to be left alone for a while.

  • Pepper and Tony both learn how to wrap the not only decorative bindings around Stephens wrists and arms and delight in getting him out of them at the end of the day. Tony especially loves to unwrap the leather belts around his waist one at a time even though he knows how to get Stephen out of them in under five seconds.

  • Over time this might even develop into a little bit of light bondage fun in the bedroom.

(Yes, I totally stole that dinner thing from the James McGraw/Miranda & Thomas Hamilton love triangle in Black Sails.)

✨

I wish you would write a fic where… | send me another one

blog.title: “bitch please, you’ve been to space”
blog.description:
emilyy//15🌟//u.k//marvel/irondad

I do incorrect quotes, feel free to send in a request! my inbox is always open if anyone wants a chat or message me cause I’m usually bored and love to meet people lmao

summary:
Tony: why is Ned sat in the corner
Peter: I’m not speaking to Ned
Tony: why?
Peter: he said I’d be a hufflepuff even though I...
body:
Tony: why is Ned sat in the corner

Peter: I’m not speaking to Ned

Tony: why?

Peter: he said I’d be a hufflepuff even though I would 100% BE A GRYFFINDOR

Ned: for the last time I AM SORRY

Tony: why?

Peter: he said I’d be a hufflepuff even though I would 100% BE A GRYFFINDOR

Ned: for the last time I AM SORRY
trail.content:
Tony: why is Ned sat in the corner

Peter: I’m not speaking to Ned

Tony: why?

Peter: he said I’d be a hufflepuff even though I would 100% BE A GRYFFINDOR

Ned: for the last time I AM SORRY

title: Ironstrange Bingo Entry 1: Recovery
body:
Title: In Silence

Summary: When Stephen needs to vent about unusually upsetting things, he goes to a special dimension called The Silence. He talks to a flower there, who always listens to him without judgment - except when he goes to talk to it about love.

Notes: For the Ironstrange bingo square “Recovery.” Title is from the Luna Sea song. [English translation of the lyrics]


There was never a rule against going on “sanity breaks.” And sometimes, when Stephen went on one, he slipped into a dimension known in the books simply as “The Silence.”

True to the name, upon entering that dimension, a deafening silence would envelop a visitor immediately.

That silence would be a supernatural one, not bound by natural law. It was not merely the absence of sound. A person completely bereft of hearing would still feel it, like an oppressive weight bearing down on their astral form.

The silence would lock an ordinary human inside their brain, the chaos of their thoughts filling in the empty spaces - and almost instantly drive them mad that way.

But Stephen Strange was no ordinary human. He could cast protective shells over his ears. After those shells of light materialized and disappeared, the silence would be, in a word, translated. Every form of life in that dimension had the capacity to speak, and their words would come to him like the softest of whispers, his talented brain assigning all the proper words.

All secrets were safe in The Silence. No information escaped to other worlds, no information told to one was ever transferred to another, and no information shared with a living thing ever corrupted it.

And in that dimension, Stephen had a favorite place: the top of a very tall mountain, where a small blue flower stood.

That flower lived apart from other plants in eternal bloom - delicate and at the same time immortal.

On his “sanity breaks,” Stephen would sit in front of this small flower and talk to it.

Sometimes, if it felt like it, the flower talked back.

“I think I’m in love,” Stephen told this flower.

Even flowers blooming alone in a quiet world know about love. So today, the flower answered <<Then why are you so sad?>>

“I think I’m afraid.”

<<Of what?>>

“Of being loved back.”


Read the rest on AO3

summary: Do You Know Who I Am?
title: Do You Know Who I Am?
body:
Tony Stark goes on a public bus for the first time in a few years.

Tony straightened his bow tie as he got ready to head to Stark Industries for a meeting.“Jarvis, get a suit ready for me. I think I’m going to come through the window. Scare them all out of their…
